agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Pensions, Investments & Financial Services TIME & DATE: 10:30 AM or upon final adjourn./recess Wednesday, February 13, 2019 PLACE: E2.026 CHAIR: Rep. Jim Murphy The committee will meet for organizational purposes and to hear invited testimony. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
